rows.label: tev000495_MSG0001
rows.name: Huh?! [ST:playername ]?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0002
rows.name:
I can't believe I let you see me like this!
You of all people! This is so humiliating...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0003
rows.name:
I was just performing my secret training regimen
when this dog happened by.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0004
rows.name:
But this is the first time I've ever stopped to pet a dog,
I swear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_JNK0010
rows.name: Grin

rows.label: tev000495_SEL0011
rows.name: Smile and thank H.B. for being kind to your pet.

rows.label: tev000495_JNK0020
rows.name: Taunt

rows.label: tev000495_SEL0021
rows.name: Remind H.B. that New LA is supposed to be his "forge."

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0005
rows.name: What? This animal belongs to you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0006
rows.name: Well, it all makes sense now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0007
rows.name:
That explains why it would appear just in time to
interrupt my training regimen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0008
rows.name:
They say that dogs resemble their owners.
Now I see just how true that is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0009
rows.name:
Nevertheless, I feel I must discuss a comment I made
when last we spoke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0010
rows.name: Hrmph! And people say that I'm rude?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0011
rows.name:
Alas, you have the better of me. I cannot even begin to
formulate a response to your cutting barbs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0012
rows.name: Perhaps we should discuss that statement further.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0013
rows.name:
Before, I said that I do not see New LA as a place for
rest and relaxation, but instead as a forge upon which
to temper my skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0014
rows.name: I may have been...mistaken.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0015
rows.name: I realized that just now, as I was petting this dog.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0016
rows.name:
While I'm in New LA, pursuing my secret training
regimen is, of course, incredibly important.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0017
rows.name:
But reminding myself of our struggle's ultimate point is
also important. Perhaps even more so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0018
rows.name:
Otherwise, no matter how strong my sense of purpose,
I could lose sight of what I'm fighting for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0019
rows.name:
Our goal as BLADEs is not just to fight for this world,
but to live in happiness upon it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_JNK0030
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: tev000495_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree with H.B.

rows.label: tev000495_JNK0040
rows.name: Taunt

rows.label: tev000495_SEL0041
rows.name: Mock H.B. for taking so long to figure this out.

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0020
rows.name: Hmm. Yes. I am truly grateful that I met this dog.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000495_MSG0021
rows.name: And, to a lesser extent...you.[ST:wait ]
